data.title: ETH Hits New All-Time High Above $4,000
data.snippet: Ethereum cryptocurrency reaches new record high as DeFi adoption surges.

data.title: Ethereum Network Upgrade Successfully Completed
data.snippet: The Ethereum network successfully completed its latest upgrade improving scalability.

data.title: Major Banks Adopt Ethereum for Smart Contracts
data.snippet: Several major financial institutions announce Ethereum blockchain adoption.
